blockquote.para: [!NOTE] The shlobj_core.h header defines FILEGROUPDESCRIPTOR as an alias which automatically selects the ANSI or Unicode version of this function based on the definition of the UNICODE preprocessor constant. Mixing usage of the encoding-neutral alias with code that not encoding-neutral can lead to mismatches that result in compilation or runtime errors. For more information, see Conventions for Function Prototypes.

summary.para: The number of elements in fgd.
An array of structures that contain the file information.
